document.discussion_title: Oaklands School evacuated after smoke spotted in server room
document.topic_text: Oaklands School evacuated after smoke spotted in server room Emergency services were called to Oaklands School in Montgomery Way today just before 2.30pm A WINSFORD primary school was evacuated after smoke was seen coming in a server room. Emergency services were called to Oaklands School in Montgomery Way today just before 2.30pm. Cheshire Fire and Rescue Service confirmed the cause of the fire was a light fitting. No one was injured during the incident. A Cheshire Fire and Rescue Service spokesman said: “A school was evacuated after smoke was found in a server room. “The area was checked with a thermal imaging camera and a light fitting was found to be the cause.” Share:
